name: fdm_comgrow_common
machine_start_gcode:
START_PRINT
G28 X Y
M140 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single] ;set bed temp
M104 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer] ;set extruder temp
M190 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single] ;wait for bed temp
M109 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer];wait for extruder temp

M400
G90
M83
G1 Z0.500 F1200
G1 E15
G1 E-0.200 Z5 F1200
G1 X78.000 Y-3.000 F8000
G1 Z0.300 F1200
G1 X128.000 E12 F{outer_wall_volumetric_speed * 1.0 /(0.3*0.5) * 30}
G1 X178.000 E8 F{outer_wall_volumetric_speed * 1.0 /(0.3*0.5) * 60}
G1 X188.000 E-0.200 Z1
M400

G90
M83
G1 X78.000 Y-1.500 F8000
G1 Z0.300 F1200
G1 X128.000 E12 F{outer_wall_volumetric_speed * 1.0 /(0.3*0.5) * 30}
G1 X178.000 E8 F{outer_wall_volumetric_speed * 1.0 /(0.3*0.5) * 60}
G1 X188.000 E-0.500 Z1
M400
